==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しつ|そう|k1=しっ|yomi=on}}

===Pronunciation===
* [[音読み|On'yomi]]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/si.s.so.o/|[ɕisso̞ː]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しっそう}}

# a [[dash]], a [[sprint]], [[running]] or [[going]] at [[full]] [[speed]]

====Usage notes====
Can be used to describe people, animals, and vehicles.

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|力走|りきそう}}: [[going]] [[all out]], [[running]] as hard as one can {{qualifier|for people, animals, vehicles}}
* {{ja-r|快走|かいそう}}: [[running]] or [[going]] [[fast]] [[gleefully]] or [[happily]] {{qualifier|for people, animals, vehicles}}
* {{ja-r|疾駆|しっく}}: a [[dash]], a [[sprint]] {{qualifier|only for vehicles or horses: something driven}}
* {{ja-r|ダッシュ}}: a [[dash]], a [[sprint]] {{qualifier|as in a race, when running hard from start to finish}}
* {{ja-r|スパート}}: a [[spurt]] of speed {{qualifier|as in a race, when running extra hard from some point after the start}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|しっそう|tr=intrans}}

# to [[dash]], to [[sprint]], to [[run]] or [[go]] at [[full]] [[speed]]
#: {{ja-usex|車は海辺を'''疾走'''した。|くるま は うみべ を '''しっそう''' した。|The car '''streaked''' along the beach.}}

====Usage notes====
Can be used to describe [[people]], [[animal]]s, and [[vehicle]]s.

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|しっそう}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|力走|りきそう}}: to go [[all out]], to [[run]] as hard as one can {{qualifier|for people, animals, vehicles}}
* {{ja-r|快走|かいそう}}: to [[run]] or [[go]] [[fast]] [[gleefully]] or [[happily]] {{qualifier|for people, animals, vehicles}}
* {{ja-r|疾駆|しっく}}: to [[dash]], to [[sprint]] {{qualifier|only for vehicles or horses: something driven}}
* {{ja-r|ダッシュ}}: to [[dash]], to [[sprint]] {{qualifier|as in a race, when running hard from start to finish}}
* {{ja-r|スパート}}: to put on a [[spurt]] of speed {{qualifier|as in a race, when running extra hard from some point after the start}}
